verbose_text: This is supported by a recent systematic review, which suggested no causal link between the use of metformin and LA.14 Of the few previous clinical trials that included those over 70 years of age, metformin treatment was not associated with significantly increased plasma lactate levels, as compared with other forms of treatment.15, 16 As LA is a multifactorial morbidity, it was expected that the advanced age would have been associated with increased risk.
